dc:title: Fall Appeal - October 1976
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An appeal for funds for their work. Confined to bed, she describes the hubbub of children and guests around her. Although they raise a lot of food, they still need to buy other provisions, including tea, for "the line."
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 916 1976-10-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
